dc_description_s: Correctional Halfway House locations. The dataset contains locations and attributes of Correctional Halfway HousesC. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. A database provided by the DC Department of Corrections (DOC) identified Halfway House locations and DC GIS staff geo-processed the data. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
dct_spatial_sm: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
dc_title_s: Halfway Houses Washington, D.C. Correctional: Washington, D.C.
